features: Portable Air Cooler & Neck Fan - Arctic Air Freedom is a Cordless, Personal Cooler That Delivers Cool, Crisp & Refreshing Air Instantly. Better Than a hand-held fan, just slip it around your neck, turn it on & the heat is gone.Controller type:Touch Control

Compact and Lightweight - With Comfort-Chill Technology, this compact, travel-friendly, and comfortable cooling device pulls in hot air and instantly transforms it into a cool refreshing breeze. It's small and does not feel heavy around the neck at all

Convenient Hands-Free Operation - This air cooler's wireless and wearable design keeps your hands free, making it ideal to be worn on hot sunny days and is suited for indoor and outdoor use. It's like having a portable air conditioner wherever you go

USB Rechargeable - It has 3 fan speeds, is USB rechargeable, and the battery runs for up to 6 hours on a single charge, making it the perfect accessory to bring with you wherever you need to cool down

Take It Anywhere - Great for relaxing at home, walking the dog, working at the office, attending a sporting event or camping, exercising at the gym, hanging out at the beach, and much more. It cools your face and neck, making your whole body feel cooler
body.description: Introducing Arctic Air Freedom, the cordless, personal cooler. Just slip Arctic Air Freedom around your neck, turn it on, and the heat is gone. Experience cool, crisp and refreshing air instantly. Arctic Air Freedom pulls in hot air and instantly transforms it into a cool refreshing breeze. Arctic Air Freedom is compact, lightweight, and comfortable. Its cordless and wearable design keeps your hands free allowing you to take it anywhere! Arctic Air Freedom has three fan speeds, is USB rechargeable, and runs for hours. Great for relaxing at home, walking the dog, working at the office, attending a sporting event, exercising at the gym, hanging out at the beach, and much more! Take Arctic Air Freedom anywhere you need cool air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great personal fan
reviews.reviewText: If you’re in the hot flash stage of life, this is for you! Doesn’t bother any body else and cools you down quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped me greatly for a couple of hours on a 90 degree day.
reviews.reviewText: I need to keep cool, even though my grandchildren keep having picnics in hot parks on their birthday's. I was amazed at how much this helped. I only had time to charge it halfway, but it still worked for about two hours on low. "High" would have been too noisy anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good speeds. Comfortable to wear and was cool but wasn't cool when it was hot and needed most. It was not cold at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Only runs for about two hours
reviews.reviewText: Pros and cons....ProsUnit stretches fully open for easy placement and removal to fit any size neck, head, etc.Can wear both directions for air to blow upwards or downwardsLonger hair does not get pulled into airflowAirflow about a 7 out of 103 speed levelsEasy access power buttonAir flow blows warm air If using in temperatures above 80 degreesLightweight on neck and shoulder areaConsTakes hours to fully chargeCharging cord only about 12 inches longNeeds to be plugged into cell phone charge source, doesn't have it's ownOnly runs for about 2, 2and 1/2 hours on full chargeMust charge fully between uses or only lasts about 45 minutesQuite loud when on full speedCools well in temperatures below 75 degreesQuite loud when on full speedI've only used this unit about 5 times.It does not last more than 3 hours on a full charge.When I wore it outside versus in the house, the airflow turns to warm.When not in use, I recommend keeping it on the charger.Once removed from the charger, the run time decreases to about an hour....even if it was previously fully charged.I like how it stretches open, up and down for easy placement and is quite lightweight for ease of comfort.I have long hair and no issues with it tugging or pulling hair into airflow.It's a neat little gadget.However, don't expect it to cool you very much if you're using it outside in warm temps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I was ready to give it five stars
reviews.reviewText: So I was definitely going to give this five stars, but after having it for a few months, definitely couldn’t give it five. This product started off really awesome. I was working as hospice case manager and going into some of these long-term care facilities I was sweating buckets. I wanted something that would cool me down, but not freeze my patients. It worked for about a month and then it stopped charging. When it stopped charging, it stopped turning on, and the only thing that cooled me down was the metal piece in the back of the contraption. Eventually I just tossed it because it was no longer working. It worked for a little bit and I’ll definitely give it a couple stars because it did work in the beginning, but really sad it stopped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you cool
reviews.reviewText: This air cooler is great. Very light weight and it keeps you cool. I also love how it has 3 different settings depending on how hot you are. I would Definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best gift she ever got!
reviews.reviewText: This artic sit cooler was a life saver for my friend. She took it everywhere especially to card club in her senior living community as well as used around the clock in her apartment. The perfect gift !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after my coworker had found a similar one from the same brand at work. We work in planes and when the A/C is off they can get pretty hot. I bought this hoping it would help alleviate that a little bit but it was very underwhelming. If its hot you'll just have hot air blowing in your face and only when you are in an air conditioned area is it good. It's not adjustable so you can't bend it to your liking and if it's quiet the fans sounds are quite noticeable. My coworkers thought they were cool though.
Esta muy práctico, pero la batería dura muy poco

reviews.reviewTitle: Keeping yourself cool in hot weather.
reviews.reviewText: I like it since it keeps you cool and refreshed on hot days either out or inside. On high speed it is somewhat noisy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Moves the air well wish it blew at the back too
reviews.reviewText: High and low fanLasted the day after full charge at a concert and was borrowed by a friend or two aswell
Works perfectly. As described. Very good purchase

Súper opción para el calor. Viajes o paseos. Te refresca bastante bien, incluso en la velocidad más pequeña el aire que avienta es buenísimo y reconfortante. Tiene un diseño lindo, no te ves rara al usarlo, y la pila tiene buena duración. Me pareció que el nivel de ruido está bien. Súper recomendable.
